duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver exceptional service to clients, visitors, and trade partners as the first point of contact.
Manage incoming phone calls and assist visitors, providing a warm and friendly atmosphere.
Coordinate and facilitate preparation and setup for in-office client meetings and internal events, including food and drink ordering, delivery, setup, and cleanup.
Respond to requests from clients for assistance or information.
Compose correspondence, maintain inventory, and support other administrative needs as required.

education_certification.credential: Minimum high school diploma; GED; or completion of one year of college or technical school.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office software, specifically Outlook, Word, and Excel.
Valid driver’s license and reliable transportation.
Documentation that allows to work in the United States of America.
